entry.def: If you describe something as the mainstay of a particular thing, you mean that it is the most basic part of it.

example.ex: Fish and rice were the mainstays of the country's diet...
example.tran: 鱼和米是该国的主要食品。

example.ex: This principle of collective bargaining has been a mainstay in labor relations in this country.
example.tran: 这一集体谈判原则已经成为该国劳动关系的重要基础。
